history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04334
FULL TITLE : TRAFFIC CRISIS ACT OF 2016 MAKIISA. MAKISAMA. MAGKAISA.
SHORT TITLE : Traffic Crisis Act Of 2016 Maki-isa, Makisama, Magka-isa
ABSTRACT : Aims to pave the way for further legislation aimed at alleviating the land-based traffic crisis not Justin the identified Metropolitan Areas but other parts of the country where such crisis may exist.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D., FARIÑAS, RODOLFO C., SARMIENTO, CESAR V., SUAREZ, DANILO E.
DATE FILED : 2016-11-09
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
